name: Star Force: Galaxy Shooter
description:
Infinite run of pixel fun! 

The long patrol in the depth of space.. The lost planet your ship's landed on.. 
Unknown race that wants to kill you, by any means neccesary!
Get on board, commander, aliens need to be destroyed!

Enjoy the game of war tactics and wits: you are all alone agains aliens on the endless plains of unknown planet, with no signal from other ships.

This war is yours! With each passing second, more enemies will attack you!
Learn their tactics, use your skill that was forged in may battles - but most importantly, don't let your guard down!

Fly through the sky of unknown planet, defeat hordes of enemies, force them to become your prey, survive for as long as you can in this alternative and reloaded view of classic Nokia game! The warmth of early games, which became classics, is now available to you - for free!

Once this game was the best we had on our old mobile phones. Now you can enjoy all the fun of the original game on your device!

Endless mode READY - challenge yourself to the battle in deep space!
Endless HARDCORE mode READY - for pro gamers, with one life only!
Fly through the hordes of enemy space ships!
Get coins for each kill!
Use the coins to unlock unique skins for your spaceship!

Features:
Five types of enemies!
Dynamic battles!
Original skins for your space ships!
No in-app purchases!

Available now on Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ardaen.starforce&hl=en

Four additional modes are under construction!
Be sure to leave your feedback!
